column4: can someone help me everytim i try to enable universe i get an error when i reload  i get this >> http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/dapper/main/source/Sources.gz: Sub-process gzip returned an error code (1)
can someone help me getting universe enabled so i can update flash and all my other software
absolutely, what version of Ubuntu do you have?
well, i haven't used dapper yet, though i'm pretty sure it's the same.
crack open a terminal, please.
now, type 'cd /etc/apt'
and type 'ls'
depending on your favorite editor.
well, i recommend gedit if you want something graphical.
could you type ctrl-x, please?
and type 'gksudo gedit sources.list'?
Ok, could you use pastebin and copy+paste that file into pastebin, so I can see what you have?
ok, gedit's still open, right?
ok lemme check your sources.list file.
ok, this is easy.
see those lines that have # (not ##) before them?
just delete the # before the repositories you want to enable.
when you're done, save the file and then run 'sudo apt-get update'
and you're all done.
right.
# tells apt to ignore that line.
No problem, and if it doesn't work (but I swear it will), I'll stick around in here.
well, that really depends.
